Package org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.name

Class Matcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.name.Matcher
  • public final class Matcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for matching Patterns against Pathes.
